sentences.en: " What do you do at home? Writing an autobiography? "
sentences.cn: “ 在家做什么,写自传 吗 ?

sentences.en: He published his autobiography last autumn.
sentences.cn: 他去年秋天出版了自己的自传。

sentences.en: He rounded out his quartet with an autobiography.
sentences.cn: 他以自传作为他的四部曲的结尾.

sentences.en: His autobiography has sold more than 36,000 copies in hardback.
sentences.cn: 他的自传精装本已经卖出了36,000多册。

sentences.en: His autobiography provides an illuminating insight into his mind.
sentences.cn: 他的自传可以让读者深入洞察他的精神世界。

sentences.en: His autobiography was written late in life.
His life story is recounted in two fascinating volumes of autobiography.
sentences.cn: 这两卷引人入胜的自传小说详述了他的生平.

sentences.en: I enjoy reading Mark Twain's autobiography.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢读马克·吐温的自传.

sentences.en: In his Autobiography he reports a personal experience of racial harassment.
sentences.cn: 在他的《自传》中,他记述了遭受种族骚扰的亲身经历.

sentences.en: Liddy later opined in his autobiography that he could have used a much bigger shredder.
sentences.cn: 利迪后来在他的自传中说,他本应该使用一台大一些的碎纸机.

sentences.en: Mortimer recounted his indebtedness to her in his autobiography.
sentences.cn: 莫蒂默在他的自传里讲述了对她的感激。

sentences.en: The blind man threaded his way through difficulties writing his autobiography.
sentences.cn: 那个盲人克服困难写自传.

sentences.en: This book clearly falls into the category of fictionalised autobiography.
sentences.cn: 这本书很显然属于自传体小说。

sentences.en: This would lead one to expect a fat, dense and detailed autobiography. The reverse is true. The book is short and spare.
sentences.cn: 这会让人以为是一本内容晦涩而详尽的大部头自传。但正好相反，这本书简短明了。

sentences.en: Yesterday she was incommunicado, putting the finishing touches to her autobiography.
sentences.cn: 昨天她闭门独处，对她的自传作最后的润色。

words.tran_cn: 自传的；自传体的；自传作家的
自传的；自传体的；自传作家的

trans.tran_en: a book in which someone writes about their own life, or books of this type
